item.title: angrykitty add a quote by Paulo Friere
item.description:
"I'd like to say to us as educators; poor are those among us who lose their capacity to dream, to create their courage to denounce and announce.
- this is one of those quotes that led to my bennett quote. man i hated that woman. " -- Paulo Friere

item.title: angrykitty add a quote by Arnold Bennett
item.description:
"There can be no knowledge without emotion. We may be aware of a truth, yet until we have felt its force, it is not ours. To the cognition of the brain must be added the experience of the soul.
-i got this quote from a john buccigross column (ESPN.com). the reason why i got it, was that i got pissed at this woman i used to work with that always sent quotes with her e-mails that she thought made her look smart....we're both teachers....anyhow....i thought this quote made me seem extra smart, but really, i think it's kinda lame...." -- Arnold Bennett
